li.link: Can I use MyFaces extensions with the JSF RI?

dl.dd: MyFaces is a Open Source Implementation of the JavaServer Faces Framework. See the JSR 127 for more info.
Yes, Apache MyFaces works with Tomcat5.5. If you see a blank page in your browser, try to remove the JAR files jsp-2.0.jar and commons-el.jar of the folder WEB-INF/lib.

dl.dt: Can I use MyFaces extensions with the JSF RI?
dl.dd: Yes, most of the Apache MyFaces extentions work with JSF RI. You must only copy myfaces-extentions.jar to your WEB-INF/lib folder. To be able to use the MyFaces extensions add the following line to your JSPs: <%@ taglib uri="http://myfaces.apache.org/extensions" prefix="x"%> The current version of our TilesViewHandler will not work with the JSF RI. If you notice other problems please submit a ticket on JIRA
